TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program freezes on starting new game

Articles.Content:
When I start a new game, the screen freezes with Gene Kerman's introductory speech. If I start a new game with no mods, this doesn't happen.

I have tried verifying the contents of the game on Steam and all files passed

Screenshot: http://imgur.com/bgV4wxP
